titleStmt.title: Some remarks upon a paper which Sir George Hungerford, by a very unusual and unfair practice, delivered at the door of the House of Commons, after a full hearing of his cause before the committee.
titleStmt.author: Hungerford, George, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Publication information suggested by the Bodleian Library.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
